trans-unit.source: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.
trans-unit.target: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

trans-unit.source: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.
trans-unit.target: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.
trans-unit.target: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.

trans-unit.source: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless. Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless. Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

trans-unit.source: {3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry. {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: {3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry. {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
